name: Facility Design Routing Code
title: FDRC
definition: Identifies the customer location routing code for the design contact for the facility in a combined ASR situation.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is "N", "C" or "T", the RTR field is "S" or "1-10", and the STREE T  ( DSGCON )  field is not populated or the DSGCON FAX NO field is not populated and the FDRC is different from the DRC, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: The routing code represents the followin g  information%3A  Company  Street  Floor  Room  City  State/Province  ZIP Code
When populated, this will be the first choice for routing the facility DLR.
The codes are assigned by the provider.
